```{r, echo = F}
inputPanel(
  selectInput("groupA", label = "Group A:", 
              choices = c("condition", "cell"), selected = "condition"),
  selectInput("groupB", label = "Group B:", 
              choices = c("cell", "condition"), selected = "cell")
)

renderPlot({
  plotPCA(rld, intgroup = c(input$groupA, input$groupB))
})
```
